title: Alside ASCEND Composite Cladding System Marketing Brochure

sections.title: Alside – Brand Overview & Vision
sections.content: Alside is a trusted, U.S.-based manufacturer renowned for delivering high‑performance exterior solutions that combine durability with sophisticated design. The brand’s reputation is built on quality craftsmanship, innovative GP² technology, and a commitment to Made‑in‑USA excellence. Central to Alside’s messaging are the powerful taglines that frame the ASCEND Composite Cladding System: “Elevate Your Expectations” and “Different. Better. Beautiful.” These statements convey the brand’s promise to raise the standard of residential siding while offering homeowners a distinctive, beautiful, and resilient finish. Together, the brand’s heritage and forward‑thinking vision set the stage for a cladding solution that truly stands out.

selected_images.reason: Shows a luxury home with the ASCEND composite cladding installed, illustrating the premium look and quality that Alside promises.
Depicts residential homes featuring ASCEND siding, reinforcing the brand’s visual identity and the tagline “Different. Better. Beautiful.”

key_takeaways: Alside is a reputable, U.S.-made brand known for durable, high‑quality exterior cladding.
The ASCEND system is positioned with the taglines “Elevate Your Expectations” and “Different. Better. Beautiful.” to highlight its premium performance and aesthetic appeal.

sections.title: ASCEND® Composite Cladding System – Overview
sections.content: The ASCEND® Composite Cladding System from Alside delivers the timeless, wood‑grain elegance homeowners love while providing the durability and peace of mind of a high‑performance exterior solution. Backed by patented (GP)² technology, ASCEND resists moisture, UV fading, fire and impact, so the home stays beautiful year after year with virtually no upkeep. Its 7‑inch profile and designer‑inspired palette of 20 fade‑resistant colors give any residence a premium, custom look that instantly elevates curb appeal. With a non‑prorated lifetime limited warranty, ASCEND combines luxury aesthetics, low‑maintenance living, and long‑term value in one complete cladding system.

selected_images.reason: Shows an upscale home fully clad in ASCEND, illustrating the premium, high‑end appearance the product provides.
Another hero image of a luxury residence highlighting the wood‑like look and sophisticated design possible with ASCEND.
Comparison chart that visually confirms ASCEND’s superior features over competing siding options, reinforcing its premium positioning.

key_takeaways: Wood‑grain aesthetics with the durability of a composite system.
Low‑maintenance – no painting, resistant to water, UV, fire and impact.
Lifetime limited warranty provides long‑term confidence.
Premium 7‑inch profile and 20 designer colors boost home value and curb appeal.

sections.title: Key Features & Benefits
sections.content: ASCEND® Composite Cladding delivers the authentic look of real wood with a detailed grain texture that’s virtually indistinguishable from natural timber. Built to withstand the elements, it offers superior durability, fire‑rated (Class A) and moisture‑resistant performance, so homeowners can feel confident in any climate. The low‑maintenance design means you’ll never need repainting or frequent repairs, translating into significant cost‑of‑ownership savings over the life of the home. Impact‑resistant construction and insulating properties add extra protection and energy efficiency, while the 20 designer‑inspired colors let you keep your home looking fresh for years to come.

selected_images.reason: Shows the realistic wood‑grain texture of ASCEND, reinforcing the wood‑like appearance claim.
Comparison chart highlights ASCEND’s advantages—fire, moisture resistance, low maintenance, and warranty—over competing siding options.

key_takeaways: Wood‑like aesthetics with a high‑end, 7‑inch profile.
Durable, fire‑rated (Class A) and moisture‑resistant for year‑round protection.
Low‑maintenance design eliminates painting and reduces upkeep costs.
Impact‑resistant and insulating, delivering energy savings and added home value.

sections.title: How ASCEND Stands Apart – Competitive Comparison
sections.content: ASCEND delivers the warm, natural look of real wood while outlasting vinyl, wood, fiber cement, and engineered wood in every key category. Its high‑end wood‑grain aesthetics win the beauty battle, yet it requires no painting, staining, or regular upkeep—something traditional wood and most other options simply can’t promise. Thanks to Class A fire rating, moisture resistance, and built‑in thermal insulation, ASCEND provides performance and durability that vinyl and fiber cement fall short on, and it backs all of this with a non‑prorated lifetime warranty. In short, ASCEND is the only cladding system that checks every box for homeowners who want lasting beauty, peace of mind, and lower long‑term costs.

selected_images.reason: The comparison chart visually highlights ASCEND’s advantages over vinyl, wood, fiber cement, and engineered wood across all feature categories.

key_takeaways: Matches wood aesthetics but lasts longer with minimal maintenance.
Offers superior fire performance, moisture resistance, and insulation.
Provides a non‑prorated lifetime warranty—unmatched by competitors.
Delivers lower total cost of ownership through durability and no repainting.

sections.title: Patented (GP)² Technology – The Science Behind ASCEND
sections.content: ASCEND’s patented (GP)² Technology blends a high‑performance core of glass fibers with a suite of engineered additives to deliver a cladding system that truly stands up to the elements. The glass fibers create a rigid, stable matrix that resists warping and adds long‑term strength, while titanium dioxide acts as a UV shield, preventing the polymer from breaking down under harsh sunlight. Weatherable pigments are chemically bonded into the material so even deep, dark colors retain their richness without fading, and impact modifiers absorb dents and dings from hail or accidental contact. Integrated flame retardants slow the spread of smoke and flames, enhancing safety without compromising aesthetics. Together, these components give ASCEND a water‑resistant surface that repels moisture, eliminates rot, and maintains its appearance year after year.

selected_images.reason: Shows a bright, sun‑lit garden scene that highlights the UV exposure the cladding must endure, reinforcing the role of titanium dioxide and weatherable pigments.
Close‑up of water droplets beading on the textured surface demonstrates the water‑resistant performance of the (GP)² Technology.

key_takeaways: Glass fibers provide unmatched strength and dimensional stability.
Titanium dioxide and weatherable pigments protect against UV degradation and fading.
Impact modifiers and flame retardants enhance durability and safety.
Water‑resistant formulation prevents rot, warping, and swelling.

sections.title: Design Tools – Visualizer & Gallery
sections.content: The ASCEND Visualizer lets homeowners instantly see how different cladding colors and styles will look on their own home, creating realistic before‑and‑after images in just a few clicks. From any mobile device, you can explore the design‑ready gallery, browse curated color palettes, and even upload a photo of your house for a virtual makeover. Our design team is on standby to fine‑tune your uploads, ensuring the virtual preview matches real‑world lighting and perspective. All of your selections can be saved, compared, and shared with family or a contractor, making the decision‑making process smooth and confidence‑boosting.

selected_images.reason: Shows the ASCEND Visualizer interface where users create virtual before‑and‑after shots.
Demonstrates the dramatic transformation a home can achieve with ASCEND cladding, reinforcing the tool’s visual impact.

key_takeaways: Easily preview any ASCEND color or style on your own home with the Visualizer.
Upload personal photos, save designs, and share options for confident decision‑making.

sections.title: 20 Fade‑Resistant Color Choices
sections.content: Discover the full palette of 20 fade‑resistant colors available for ASCEND Composite Cladding, thoughtfully grouped to inspire any exterior style. From crisp whites and creamy neutrals like Glacier White and Monterey Sand, to warm browns such as Canyon Drift and Flagship Brown, you’ll find the perfect backdrop for classic or contemporary homes. Rich grays—including Cape Cod Gray, Sterling Gray, and Charcoal Smoke—offer sophisticated depth, while blues like Laguna Blue and Harbor Blue add a refreshing coastal vibe. Greens such as Mountain Fern bring a touch of nature, and accent tones like Riviera Dusk and Fired Brick provide bold highlights that stand the test of time. Each hue is engineered for lasting vibrancy, ensuring your home looks fresh year after year.

selected_images.reason: Shows a grid of all 20 color swatches, giving customers a clear visual of the full palette.

key_takeaways: A diverse range of 20 fade‑resistant colors lets homeowners match any architectural style.
Colors are organized into intuitive groups—whites/creams, browns, grays, blues, greens, and accents—for easy selection.

sections.title: Lifetime Limited Warranty
sections.content: The ASCEND siding system is backed by a non‑prorated, lifetime limited warranty, giving you confidence that your investment is protected for the life of your home. This warranty covers the material and performance of the siding, ensuring that the wood‑like appearance you love will remain intact without hidden fees or diminishing coverage over time. Because ASCEND is fire‑ and moisture‑resistant, the warranty reflects the product’s durability and long‑term reliability. When you choose ASCEND, you’re not just getting premium aesthetics—you’re gaining lasting peace of mind that your home’s exterior will stay beautiful and resilient for decades.

selected_images.reason: The image features the lifetime warranty badge alongside other key product icons, visually reinforcing the warranty promise.

key_takeaways: Non‑prorated lifetime limited warranty protects the ASCEND siding for the life of the home.
Warranty covers material and performance, with no hidden fees or reduced coverage over time.

sections.title: Contact Information & Next Steps
sections.content: We’re ready to help you bring the beauty of ASCEND Composite Cladding to your next project. For detailed specifications, color options, and design inspiration, visit ASCENDCompositeCladding.com or explore the full Alside portfolio at www.alside.com. Have questions or need a personalized quote? Call our dedicated team at 1‑800‑922‑6009, or stop by our showroom at 3773 State Road, Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio 44223. Let’s start a conversation today and discover how ASCEND can make your home different, better, and beautiful.

key_takeaways: Visit ASCENDCompositeCladding.com or www.alside.com for full product details.
Call 1‑800‑922‑6009 or visit 3773 State Road, Cuyahoga Falls, OH for personalized assistance.
